pr_title: KAFKA-10766: Unit test cases for RocksDBRangeIterator

timeline.bodyText: It is not a good idea to change a class due to unit tests if it is not absolutely necessary. In this case it is definitely not necessary. See my suggestion how to change the tests.
timeline.author: cadonna
cadonna

replies.bodyText: @cadonna , honestly even I wasn't making the changes that I ended up making but I assumed that makeNext is the only method that needs to be tested wrt Range Iterator as other methods are inherited by it so those should have test cases separately. I have changes the test cases now.
replies.author: vamossagar12

replies.bodyText: @cadonna , did you get  a chance to review these changes?
replies.author: vamossagar12

timeline.message: KAFKA-10766: Unit test cases for RocksDBRangeIterator

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    final RocksDBRangeIterator rocksDBRangeIterator = new RocksDBRangeIterator(
          
          
            
                            storeName,
          
          
            
                        rocksIterator,
          
          
            
                        Collections.emptySet(),
          
          
            
                        key1Bytes,
          
          
            
                        key3Bytes,
          
          
            
                        true
          
          
            
                    );
          
          
            
                    final RocksDBRangeIterator rocksDBRangeIterator = new RocksDBRangeIterator(
          
          
            
                        storeName,
          
          
            
                        rocksIterator,
          
          
            
                        Collections.emptySet(),
          
          
            
                        key1Bytes,
          
          
            
                        key3Bytes,
          
          
            
                        true
          
          
            
                    );
          
      
    
    
  

Please also fix the other wrong indentations.
timeline.author: cadonna
cadonna

timeline.bodyText: nit: Couldn't you Instead of using a literal, use Bytes.increment(key4Bytes) for the to parameter?
timeline.author: cadonna
cadonna

timeline.bodyText: I think, it would be good to verify that a second call to  peekNextKey() right after the first call to peekNextKey() returns the same value, since this is the main difference between next() and peekNextKey().
timeline.author: cadonna
cadonna

timeline.bodyText: Please remove empty lines here and in the other test methods.
timeline.author: cadonna
cadonna
